metadata.title: CVE-2021-24115 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
In Botan before 2.17.3, constant-time computations are not used for certain decoding and encoding operations (base32, base58, base64, and hex).

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-24115` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

botan - 2.17.3+dfsg-1
libbotan-2-17 - 2.17.3+dfsg-1
python3-botan - 2.17.3+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: botan package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.17.3+dfsg-1').
